name.description: Specifies the name of the EventGrid Topic resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the EventGrid Topic exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

endpoint.description: The Endpoint associated with the EventGrid Topic.

primary_access_key.description: The Primary Shared Access Key associated with the EventGrid Topic.

secondary_access_key.description: The Secondary Shared Access Key associated with the EventGrid Topic.

create.description: Used when creating the EventGrid Topic.

update.description: Used when updating the EventGrid Topic.

read.description: Used when retrieving the EventGrid Topic.

delete.description: Used when deleting the EventGrid Topic.
